definition: A title given to a person of high rank or nobility, typically used to refer to a male individual. This term is commonly used in historical contexts or when discussing the feudal system.

examples.german: Der Herzog lebt in einem Schloss.
examples.english: The duke lives in a castle.

examples.german: Der Herzog ist ein Mitglied des Adels.
examples.english: The duke is a member of the nobility.
